Several script sources on the vault were used in the creation of this tool.  The two most notable are:

Sir Elric's Verbal Mob Spawner v1.1
http://nwvault.ign.com/View.php?view=Scripts.Detail&id=2686
Copyright (c) 2005 Melnibone Corp.

Nereng's The Invisible Listener v2.0
http://nwvault.ign.com/View.php?view=Scripts.Detail&id=2207

Many MANY thanks to Nereng for his invaluable help with listeners.  He is a great guy and has been very patient with me as I learned how to deal with making Tink listen to me.

Other sample code / ideas gathered from the following vault postings:
Beta Testers Toolkit v1.3 by DnC Team
http://nwvault.ign.com/View.php?view=Scripts.Detail&id=2673

Temple Cast Heal by Bioware (NW_D1_TEMPLEHEAL)	

void dmwand_AdvanceTime(int nDay) in the DMFI wand
http://nwvault.ign.com/View.php?view=Scripts.Detail&id=2237

value.0:
Use this item to spawn up Tink, the DM Listener.

It takes a couple seconds after she appears at your side for her to start listening to your voice commands.

To display a list of commands, type in:
tink help

For more details on how a command works, type in just the command.  An example of this:
give xp

You can hide from your players that you are issuing commands to Tink by using the dm channel.  An example of this is:
/dm give xp 100 bob

Should you encounter any problems with Tink, the fastest way to get a hold of us is through our forum.  You can post your concerns here:

http://www.realmsofmythology.net/realmsbbs/viewtopic.php?t=1021

Enjoy!
